articles.title: Manchester United sale: Finnish businessman Zilliacus out - ESPN India
articles.description: Finnish businessman Thomas Zilliacus has withdrawn his offer to buy Manchester United, telling ESPN the process is "a farce."
articles.content:
Finnish businessman Thomas Zilliacus has withdrawn his offer to buy Manchester United, telling ESPN the process is "a farce."
